mapper.select:
SELECT d.* FROM distribution d where d.user_id = #{userId}
and status !=2
and invest_status !=2
limit 0,1
SELECT d.* FROM distribution d where d.user_id = #{userId} and dis_level_one_user_id = #{fatherUserId} limit 0,1
